mean_cn: n. 放弃，脱离关系，拒绝承认，抛弃，弃权，出家
mean_en: the act of renouncing something or someone
word_etyma: re反对+nunci说出+ation名词后缀→放弃；脱离关系；拒绝承认；抛弃
sentence: I've been much happier since the renunciation of my old faith of Buddhism.
sentence_trans: 自从我放弃信佛以后，我变得更加快乐了。
sentence_phrase: the renunciation of my old faith
